name: The Complex: Found Footage
description:
Wander through a maze of endless hallways and intricate areas in a inter-dimensional space, leaving you profoundly confused and disoriented.
You will come upon various mysteries and will desperately try to find your way out of there.
• View the world through a VHS camera.
• Traverse and explore the huge, unforgiving and mysterious world of "The Complex".
• Deal with an unknown entity.
